util

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility used for debugging.

    EXAMPLE:
    Debug debug = new Debug("Name of Class> ");
    debug.setOn(true); // sets debugging ON
    debug.setWriteToFile(true); // sets flag for writing to file(debug.log) ON
